SEARCH
Module sc2002OOP
Package sc2002OOP.obj.companyrepresentative

Interface ICompanyRepresentative

All Known Implementing Classes:
CompanyRepresentative
public interface ICompanyRepresentative

Company Representative Interface

This interface defines the mandatory contract for any class representing a CompanyRepresentative user role. It specifies all necessary methods for managing internship opportunities and handling student applications submitted to the representative's company.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Kee Kai Wen, Kelvin Tay Wei Jie, Koay Jun Zhi, Lim Jia Wei Jerald, Teo Kai Jie
See Also:

    Description
    void
    approveRejectApplicant(Scanner sc)
    Allows the company representative to review PENDING internship applications and change their status to SUCCESSFUL (approve) or UNSUCCESSFUL (reject).
    void
    createInternship(Scanner sc)
    Guides the company representative through the process of creating a new internship opportunity for their associated company.
    String
    getCompanyID()
    Retrieves the unique ID of the company associated with this representative.

    Retrieves the department of the representative within the company.

    Retrieves the unique email (User ID) of the representative.

    Retrieves the job position of the representative.

    Toggles the visibility status (On/Off) for students of an internship opportunity managed by this company.
